articles.author: Jay Peters, Jon Porter
articles.title: More than six thousand subreddits have gone dark to protest Reddit's API changes - The Verge
articles.description: Many of Reddit’s most popular communities have started to set themselves private to protest Reddit’s upcoming API pricing changes that are forcing beloved third-party apps to shut down.
